all_questions.question: What type of parsing was used for machine translation?
all_questions.context: So that is the bottom-up parsing used for machine translation.

all_questions.question: Why was the previous example considered linguistically inadequate?
all_questions.context: It was not proper syntax. It was just a hierarchical model.

all_questions.question: What labels are assigned to syntactic trees by linguists?
all_questions.context: those that have labels that linguists assign to them when drawing a tree bank.

all_questions.question: Why did adding syntactic information make the life more complicated?
all_questions.context: So, yeah. And on slides by David Cheng from in 2010, I will illustrate why the added syntactic information actually makes your life more complicated.
